intro.title: VEGAS Foundation
subtitle: Redefining Traditional Investment Concepts in 2025
Make your funds flow
description: From Las Vegas to the world
ushering in a new era of wealth
intro.about: Vegas Foundation is a globally leading innovative financial institution dedicated to providing innovative financial services and asset management solutions for the global casino and gaming industry. The core goal of the foundation is to promote transparency, security, and stable profitability in the gaming industry!
intro.team: The founding team of Vegas Foundation includes globally renowned financial experts and an international professional operations team, committed to delivering high returns to partners and investors through its unique fund management system.

notice: 1.The malicious serial number intelligent identification and tracing system has been activated. Real-time scanning of accounts associated with funds is in place, and accounts blocked by the system cannot be manually unblocked.2.Before July 3, the Foundation will provide an additional reward of 200,000 USDT to the community leaders of the top 100 performing teams globally (with a monthly performance within three generations exceeding 2 million). This reward will be directly airdropped to the profit wallet address.3.Starting from June 3, the daily profit rate is 3%. Additionally, a weekly cycle of daily profit rates of 5%, 4%, and 3% will be implemented, along with a 15-day cycle of 2% and 1%. Gambling profit dividends will be distributed in a 5-4-3-2-1 cycle. Generation rewards are as follows: three generations without direct referral requirements; five direct referrals to claim seven generations; eight direct referrals to claim ten generations; ten direct referrals to claim twelve generations; fifteen direct referrals to claim fifteen generations of profits (automatically activated). While increasing generation rewards, the profit level will be reduced by one tier. Wishing everyone a pleasant betting experience! Vegas Foundation Technical Department, June 3, 2025
